document_data.mainbody:
Geezer Loryss was a vegetable vendor in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Geezer was an aging human man with graying hair.
In the , during the Absolute crisis, Geezer ran a vegetable stall and was affected by the citys new draconian laws that confiscated most farm animals and produce entering the city in order to fight encroaching famine, according to the Flaming Fists. At one point during that tumultuous year, Geezer managed to get a shipment of cabbages into Baldurs Gate but the card ended up upturned, scattering the vegetables. The old man lamented his beloved vegetables fate and his empty stall.
